Trade/Device Name(s): Dario LC Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Dario LC Blood Glucose Monitoring System, a self-testing system for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood using a meter and smartphone app.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative self-testing measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip by people with diabetes at home, not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
